cells.data:
-- scanl :: (b -> a -> b) -> b -> [a] -> [b]
on scanl(f, startValue, xs)
	tell mReturn(f)
		set v to startValue
		set lng to length of xs
		set lst to {startValue}
		repeat with i from 1 to lng
			set v to |Î»|(v, item i of xs, i, xs)
			set end of lst to v
		end repeat
		return lst
	end tell
end scanl
